about_the_game:
'The Incredible Adventures of Josh and Connor: The Pre-Prologue' is the introductory title to the series of the same name. Influenced by a love for point & click adventure games, walking simulators and story driven content: 'The Incredible Adventures of Josh and Connor: The Pre-Prologue' is a walking simulator with point & click elements set in an original universe where you can explore the many departments of 'The AEGIS Corporation' in another dimension inhabited by robots.

The game focuses on primarily one topic: the use of AI in video games.



Within the Josh & Connor universe, things may not always be as they seem. There may be more than meets the eye to what you find when navigating the corridors and hallways. Other times it is simply just an elegant, nondescript rock who would rather you stopped staring at it so it can be a rock in peace. But you may ask yourself "why is there an elegant, yet nondescript rock in a hallway?" and were the rock willing to communicate with you, then maybe it would respond with something along the lines of "Ask the Pineapple". But of course it doesn't, because the elegant, yet nondescript rock thinks it is better than you.

Here's a handy list for what you can do in 'The Incredible Adventures of Josh and Connor: The Pre-Prologue':

  • Walk.
  • Explore.
  • Interact.
  • Enagage in meaningful conversations.
  • Gaze into the abyss, where the haunting contemplation of life's fleeting meaning casts a shadow over your minimal existence.
  • Befriend a Pineapple.

Like with any good walking simulator or narrative heavy game, various topics are touched upon within the gameplay. Some of these may be subtle, whilst others more obvious. We aim to make light of various trends, game development, common tropes and gently poke fun of them (and ourselves) in our own way as we both do tell, and don't tell a story. As with any creative works, it's open to interpretation. Find the meanings, then find the hidden meanings, then find their hidden meanings within the hidden meanings.



All in all we believe in making games that reflect our own creative sparks and are true to ourselves. They may not be your traditional type of game or follow the latest trend, but at least we can proudly say we're better than the elegant, yet nondescript rock.

This game is dedicated to our friends, family and everyone who makes our little community special. Thank you for your encouragement, time and energy spent listening to the 49 times we spoke about that one thing.




Join us on Discord if you'd like to be part of the community! c:



49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49 49.

name: The Incredible Adventures of Josh and Connor: The Pre-Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 / Intel HD 3000 or better

short_description: Inspired by point & click games and walking simulators, explore an episodic universe with subtle and humorous narratives. Challenge conventions, discover hidden meanings, and proudly be better than an elegant, yet nondescript rock.
